import React, { useContext, useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { AuthContext } from "../context/AuthContext"; import "./Navbar.css"; // Import Navbar styles const Navbar = () => { const { user } = useContext(AuthContext); // Get user data from context const [darkMode, setDarkMode] = useState(false); // State for dark mode const toggleDarkMode = () => { setDarkMode(!darkMode); document.body.classList.toggle("dark-mode"); // Toggle class for styling }; return (
